markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}. It is a random map representing jungle encounters.

## Usages

Jungle is used in the scripted interactions [Maukotu's Canopy](/maukotusCanopy/) and [Toaku Biwha Trail](/toakuBiwhaTrail/).

An alternate design of the map is used in the interaction [Bleakrock Shrine](/bleakrockShrine/).
